title: You Don't Have to Pick a Winner in Streaming Services. Here's Why
description: Streaming entertainment has certainly been one of the most prominent growth sectors in the past decade.  Maybe it's best to consider buying shares of all the following companies to fully gain exposure.  A discussion about streaming service stocks likely brings up thoughts about Netflix (NASDAQ: NFLX) first and foremost.
